TextLibrary.Text: We should head to Gorgon III, closer to where the Soulless are, and use the Krystalli Heart to listen to what they are doing.
We should head to Gorgon III, closer to where the Soulless are, and use the Krystalli Heart to listen to what they are doing.
It is wrong to desecrate this poor creature.
It is wrong to desecrate this poor creature.
Beta Prime was correct. We've already begun walking this path. We have little choice any more.
Beta Prime was correct. We've already begun walking this path. We have little choice any more.
